video.title: Better Call Saul
video.synopsis: This Emmy-nominated prequel to "Breaking Bad" follows small-time attorney Jimmy McGill as he transforms into morally challenged lawyer Saul Goodman.

episodes.synopsis: Struggling lawyer Jimmy McGill tries to leave his seedy past behind him, but old habits die hard when a big opportunity presents itself.
episodes.title: Uno

episodes.synopsis: In a tense and violent standoff with dangerous criminals, Jimmy will live or die based on his own powers of persuasion.
episodes.title: Mijo

episodes.synopsis: With the cops holding his dangerous new client, Jimmy tries to point the police in another direction while saving his own skin in the process.
episodes.title: Nacho

episodes.synopsis: A desperate Jimmy gets creative in order to drum up new business and manages to sneak in a little revenge for good measure.
episodes.title: Hero

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy tests the waters in a new area of law practice while doing his best to keep his brother out of harm's way.
episodes.title: Alpine Shepherd Boy

episodes.synopsis: When Mike needs a favor, he finds Jimmy willing to go to surprising lengths to lend a hand. However, that doesn't put Mike's demons to rest.
episodes.title: Five-O

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's new clients put him at a personal and professional crossroads, so he calls in a favor for some covert assistance.
episodes.title: Bingo

episodes.synopsis: The opportunity to serve a crooked company some legal justice sends Jimmy digging for evidence and reinvigorates Chuck in the process.
episodes.title: Rico

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's big case forces him to swallow his pride and look for help from an unlikely source. Meanwhile, Mike gets back in the job market.
episodes.title: Pimento

episodes.synopsis: While visiting his hometown, Jimmy reunites with his old partner in crime. It doesn't take long before the two start hitting their stride again.
episodes.title: Marco

episodes.synopsis: As Jimmy revels in his newfound freedom, his relationship with Kim takes a turn. Mike cuts ties with a reckless client.
episodes.title: Switch

episodes.synopsis: Mike tries to defuse a volatile situation before it blows up in his face. Jimmy's old instincts kick in as he works to clear an eccentric client.
episodes.title: Cobbler

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy's efforts to rustle up more Sandpiper clients arouse suspicion, he changes tactics -- and finds a new use for his dazzling showmanship.
episodes.title: Amarillo

episodes.synopsis: Mike weighs a lucrative offer that could lead him into murky waters, while Jimmy scrambles to repair the damage from his rogue campaign.
episodes.title: Gloves Off

episodes.synopsis: As Kim tries to claw her way back into the firm's good graces, Jimmy bristles at interference from a junior associate and Chuck revisits an old wound.
episodes.title: Rebecca

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy finds comfort in a familiar place, while Kim weighs a life-changing proposal. An alarming new threat pushes Mike to the limit.
episodes.title: Bali Ha'i

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy stumbles on a colorful solution to his problems at Davis & Main. Kim grows restless as she waits for a juicy offer to materialize.
episodes.title: Inflatable

episodes.synopsis: As Mike faces pressure from all sides, he tries to regain control of his own fate. Jimmy pursues a new opportunity that arises unexpectedly.
episodes.title: Fifi

episodes.synopsis: After a humiliating setback at work, Chuck vows to reveal Jimmy's true nature to Kim. Meanwhile, Mike makes a bold move against Hector Salamanca.
episodes.title: Nailed

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy faces one grueling choice after another in the wake of Chuck's collapse. Mike prepares for a mysterious mission in the desert.
episodes.title: Klick

episodes.synopsis: As Chuck plots his next move, another lie comes back to haunt Jimmy. A rattled Mike tries to find out who's been tracking his movements -- and how.
episodes.title: Mabel

episodes.synopsis: Mike closes in on his target and taps Jimmy for a covert mission. A new hire brightens the offices of Wexler and McGill. Kim receives troubling news.
episodes.title: Witness

episodes.synopsis: While Mike meets with his mysterious new acquaintance, Jimmy faces the humiliating aftermath of the incident at Chuck's.
episodes.title: Sunk Costs

episodes.synopsis: A tense scene unfolds at Los Pollos Hermanos as a long-simmering feud boils over. Kim helps Jimmy prepare for a courthouse meeting with Chuck.
episodes.title: Sabrosito

episodes.synopsis: As Jimmy's date with the state bar committee arrives, he and Kim set in motion a series of surprises for Chuck.
episodes.title: Chicanery

episodes.synopsis: While Chuck tries to make sense of what happened at the hearing, Jimmy finds a clever way out of a financial jam. Don Hector gets under Nacho's skin.
episodes.title: Off Brand

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy struggles to make ends meet, Kim wrestles with a guilty conscience, and Nacho lures a former supplier into his plot to bring down Hector.
episodes.title: Expenses

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy is forced to play hardball when customers try to back out of a deal. Nacho practices for his big moment. Mike forges a secret partnership.
episodes.title: Slip

episodes.synopsis: A devious scheme sends Jimmy back to Sandpiper. Meanwhile, Chuck and Howard lock horns over the firm's future, and Kim hustles to please a new client.
episodes.title: Fall

episodes.synopsis: A shell-shocked Kim reevaluates her priorities, Jimmy tries to atone for a mistake, and Chuck suffers a series of setbacks.
episodes.title: Lantern

episodes.synopsis: As Jimmy comes to terms with a sudden tragedy, Mike heads to Madrigal on a recon mission, and Nacho meets with Juan Bolsa.
episodes.title: Smoke

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy turns on the charm for a job interview, Gus stews over Hector Salamanca's condition, and a fed-up Kim unloads on Howard.
episodes.title: Breathe

episodes.synopsis: Gus's men put Nacho through an agonizing ordeal. Jimmy's easy-money scheme hits a major snag. Kim dives back into her work with Mesa Verde.
episodes.title: Something Beautiful

episodes.synopsis: To show Kim that his life's back on track, Jimmy takes a new job. Nacho gets caught in a bloodbath. Mike rocks the boat at a support group meeting.
episodes.title: Talk

episodes.synopsis: While Jimmy uses his street smarts to hawk cell phones, Kim picks up work as a public defender, and Mike interviews excavation specialists.
episodes.title: Quite a Ride

episodes.synopsis: Kim mulls a change to her work arrangement, complicating Jimmy's plans for Wexler-McGill. Mike and Gus prepare for the arrival of German laborers.
episodes.title: Piata

episodes.synopsis: Amid new strains in his relationship with Kim, Jimmy ramps up his side business and runs into trouble with the police. Hector reaches a turning point.
episodes.title: Something Stupid

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy and Kim forge ahead with an elaborate scheme to keep Huell out of jail. Mike gives the guys a night on the town, with worrying results.
episodes.title: Coushatta

episodes.synopsis: After pulling another scam with Kim, Jimmy makes a pitch to get his law license back. Werner's behavior troubles Mike. Lalo Salamanca drops in on Gus.
episodes.title: Wiedersehen

episodes.synopsis: On the anniversary of Chuck's death, Jimmy pulls out all the stops to rehabilitate his image. Meanwhile, Mike scours the area for signs of Werner.
episodes.title: Winner
